channel.title: Needing a Hoster for my server!
channel.description:
I need someone to host my server. It is good, edited and silab. I only need hoster for 5-10 days or so. Please contact me from msn if you are interested.
My msn> berkies@msn.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 06:12:45 AM[/size][hr]It would be appreciated very much if someone hosted my server.

item.title: Needing a Hoster for my server!
item.dc:creator: @IRISH-PRIDE IRISH-PRIDE
item.description:
@IRISH-PRIDE wrote:

humm

most people are gonna do one of two things.

  1. ask to be paid.

  2. steal your source.

if you wanna make your server 24/7

go to a good web hosting company and buy vps hosting for 22$ a month you can host your server right off it and your computer can be off the hole time

www.trutechosting.com - very good hosting i acculy use it for my 2 websites - both online radio stations.

need any more info email me - danieltero@hotmail.com

Read full topic
